message: Join us for a run in Piedmont Park this afternoon. http://www.piedmontpark.org/do/walks.html Meet at Hotel Registration Desk at 5:35 PM. Take MARTA subway train from Peachtree Station to Midtown, warmup jog to Piedmont Park, run on the paths around the lake. Total running distance ~3 miles. Average pace 11:00 - 12:00/mile.
We'll be the folks in shorts with ghost white legs
@steve_piercy Don't forget to bring my marta card back.
I'll join you. I might be a bit late though, because I need to get to the hotel first after the AST talk to get shorts and stuff (hotel is like 10 minutes away).
I'm in, see you in the lobby at 5:30pm.
is it warmer outside than it is in here?
Yay for us runners! Piedmont Park is a beautiful place to run, walk. Trees are blossoming, live music in the park tonight, lovely Mexican grill restaurant with patio seating at the park entrance.
Dammit missed this, anyone up for doing it again tomorrow?  Looks like the out and back is about 3-4 miles + whatever you run at the park itself.
any runners have a fanny pack or small napsack I can borrow til tomorrow noon?  I'm doing the JLA Shamrock run and need some way to hold bits and pieces..
@ktelep Recommend taking MARTA train there to avoid the crappy streets, stopping at intersections and traffic. Once you're in Midtown, it's real nice.
